author: parithosh
content:
Like this:
```
docker run ghcr.io/flcl42/send-blobs:latest $RPC_ENDPOINT \
    <number-of-blobs-to-submit> <0xethereum-private-key> <0xreceiver-address>
```
You can use https://rpc.4844-devnet-7.ethpandaops.io and get some ETH from  https://faucet-2.4844-devnet-7.ethpandaops.io (or i can send you some if you give me an address)
